description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级领导人。曾任中共中央书记处书记、全国政协副主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China, former national leader. He has served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee and a vice chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Du Qinglin.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的办事机构，杜青林曾在此担任书记。
description.en: The working body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, where Du Qinglin served as a secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾与杜青林同在中共中央书记处任职。
description.en: Chinese politician who served alongside Du Qinglin in the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾接替杜青林担任中共四川省委书记，后又与其在中共中央书记处共事。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Du Qinglin as Secretary of the CPC Sichuan Provincial Committee and later served with him in the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记。杜青林在中央书记处任职期间，习近平是总书记。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. Xi Jinping was the General Secretary during Du Qinglin's tenure in the Central Secretariat.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国组织，杜青林曾任其副主席。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, where Du Qinglin served as Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任全国政协主席，是杜青林担任副主席时的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee and was Du Qinglin's superior when Du was vice chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任全国政协主席，是杜青林担任副主席时的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee and was Du Qinglin's superior when Du was vice chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾与杜青林同任全国政协副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee alongside Du Qinglin.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学家、政治人物，曾与杜青林同任全国政协副主席。
description.en: Chinese scientist and politician who served as Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee alongside Du Qinglin.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部
en: United Front Work Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责统一战线工作的职能部门，杜青林曾任部长。
description.en: A functional department under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for united front work, where Du Qinglin served as Head.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记和中华人民共和国主席。他曾任命杜青林为农业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People's Republic of China. He appointed Du Qinglin as Minister of Agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，杜青林的前任中共中央统战部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Du Qinglin's predecessor as Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，杜青林的继任中共中央统战部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Du Qinglin's successor as Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党四川省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党四川省委员会
en: Sichuan Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在四川省的领导机关，杜青林曾任书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Sichuan Province, where Du Qinglin served as Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，杜青林的前任中共四川省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Du Qinglin's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Sichuan Provincial Committee.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国农业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农业部
en: Ministry of Agriculture of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管农业的部门，杜青林曾任部长。
description.en: The department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of agriculture, where Du Qinglin served as Minister.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院总理，杜青林任农业部长期间的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Premier of the State Council, and was Du Qinglin's superior during his tenure as Minister of Agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院总理，杜青林任农业部长期间的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Premier of the State Council, and was Du Qinglin's superior during his tenure as Minister of Agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，杜青林的前任中华人民共和国农业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Du Qinglin's predecessor as Minister of Agriculture of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，杜青林的继任中华人民共和国农业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Du Qinglin's successor as Minister of Agriculture of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党海南省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党海南省委员会
en: Hainan Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在海南省的领导机关，杜青林曾任书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Hainan Province, where Du Qinglin served as Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，杜青林的前任中共海南省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Du Qinglin's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Hainan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，杜青林的继任中共海南省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Du Qinglin's successor as Secretary of the CPC Hainan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 位于吉林长春的大学，杜青林曾在此函授学习。
description.en: A university in Changchun, Jilin, where Du Qinglin took correspondence courses.

description.zh-cn: 1963年至1966年间在中华人民共和国部分农村地区开展的政治运动，杜青林早年曾作为工作队队员参与。
description.en: A political movement carried out in parts of rural China from 1963 to 1966, in which Du Qinglin participated as a work team member in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 中国汽车制造商，杜青林曾在此工作。
description.en: A Chinese automobile manufacturer where Du Qinglin once worked.

nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团吉林省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团吉林省委员会
en: Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团在吉林省的领导机关，杜青林曾任书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Youth League of China in Jilin Province, where Du Qinglin served as Secretary.

nodes.id: 中国共产党长春市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党长春市委员会
en: Changchun Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在长春市的领导机关，杜青林曾任副书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Changchun City, where Du Qinglin served as Deputy Secretary.

nodes.id: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党吉林省委员会
en: Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在吉林省的领导机关，杜青林曾在此担任多个职务。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Jilin Province, where Du Qinglin held multiple positions.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党培养领导干部的学校，杜青林曾两次在此进修。
description.en: The school for training leading cadres of the Communist Party of China, where Du Qinglin studied on two occasions.

description.zh-cn: 位于吉林长春的大学，杜青林曾在此函授学习并获得硕士学位。
description.en: A university in Changchun, Jilin, where Du Qinglin took correspondence courses and obtained a master's degree.

nodes.id: 海南省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 海南省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 海南省人民代表大会的常设机关，杜青林曾任主任。
description.en: The standing body of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress, where Du Qinglin served as Chairman.

nodes.id: 四川省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 四川省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Sichuan Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 四川省人民代表大会的常设机关，杜青林曾任主任。
description.en: The standing body of the Sichuan Provincial People's Congress, where Du Qinglin served as Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替杜青林成为排名第一的全国政协副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Du Qinglin as the first-ranking Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，杜青林的前任海南省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, Du Qinglin's predecessor as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林出生于吉林磐石。
description.en: Du Qinglin was born in Panshi, Jilin.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林于1966年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Du Qinglin joined the Communist Party of China in 1966.

position.en: Work Team Member, Deputy Team Leader

description.zh-cn: 杜青林早年曾作为工作队队员、副组长参加“四清运动”。
description.en: In his early years, Du Qinglin participated in the 'Four Cleanups Movement' as a work team member and deputy team leader.

position.zh-cn: 标准件分厂党委秘书、挤压车间主任、党支部书记、革委会副主任、副厂长、党委副书记
position.en: Party Committee Secretary of the Standard Parts Branch, Director of the Extrusion Workshop, Party Branch Secretary, Vice Chairman of the Revolutionary Committee, Deputy Factory Director, Deputy Party Secretary

description.zh-cn: 1968年至1978年，杜青林在长春第一汽车制造厂历任多个职务。
description.en: From 1968 to 1978, Du Qinglin held various positions at Changchun First Automobile Works.

relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团吉林省委员会

description.zh-cn: 杜青林曾任共青团吉林省委副书记、书记。
description.en: Du Qinglin served as Deputy Secretary and Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林在东北师范大学政治教育专修科函授学习。
description.en: Du Qinglin studied in the correspondence course for Political Education at Northeast Normal University.

relationships.target: 中国共产党长春市委员会

description.zh-cn: 杜青林曾任中共长春市委副书记。
description.en: Du Qinglin served as Deputy Secretary of the CPC Changchun Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

position.zh-cn: 常委、组织部部长、副书记、政法委书记
position.en: Standing Committee Member, Head of the Organization Department, Deputy Secretary, Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 杜青林历任中共吉林省委常委、组织部部长、副书记、政法委书记。
description.en: Du Qinglin successively served as a Standing Committee Member, Head of the Organization Department, Deputy Secretary, and Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the CPC Jilin Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林在中共中央党校省部级干部进修班学习。
description.en: Du Qinglin studied in the advanced training class for provincial and ministerial level cadres at the Central Party School of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林在吉林大学法律系法律专业本科函授学习。
description.en: Du Qinglin completed undergraduate correspondence studies in law at the Law Department of Jilin University.

relationships.target: 中国共产党海南省委员会

description.zh-cn: 杜青林曾任中共海南省委副书记、书记。
description.en: Du Qinglin served as Deputy Secretary and Secretary of the CPC Hainan Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 海南省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 杜青林曾任海南省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Du Qinglin served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林在吉林大学经济管理学院国民经济计划与管理专业在职研究生学习，获得经济学硕士学位。
description.en: Du Qinglin pursued on-the-job postgraduate studies in National Economic Planning and Management at the School of Economics and Management of Jilin University, obtaining a Master's degree in Economics.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林在中共中央党校省部级干部进修班学习。
description.en: Du Qinglin studied in the advanced training class for provincial and ministerial level cadres at the Central Party School of the CPC.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农业部

description.zh-cn: 杜青林曾任中华人民共和国农业部部长。
description.en: Du Qinglin served as the Minister of Agriculture of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华人民共和国主席胡锦涛发布主席令，任命杜青林为农业部部长。
description.en: Then President of the People's Republic of China, Hu Jintao, issued a presidential decree appointing Du Qinglin as Minister of Agriculture.

relationships.target: 中国共产党四川省委员会

description.zh-cn: 杜青林曾任中共四川省委书记。
description.en: Du Qinglin served as Secretary of the CPC Sichuan Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 四川省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 杜青林曾任四川省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Du Qinglin served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Sichuan Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部

description.zh-cn: 杜青林曾任中共中央统战部部长。
description.en: Du Qinglin served as Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 杜青林曾任第十一届、十二届全国政协副主席。
description.en: Du Qinglin served as Vice Chairman of the 11th and 12th National Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 杜青林曾任中共中央书记处书记。
description.en: Du Qinglin served as a Secretary of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林在中央书记处任职期间，向总书记习近平汇报工作。
description.en: During his tenure at the Central Secretariat, Du Qinglin reported to General Secretary Xi Jinping.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC

description.zh-cn: 杜青林担任全国政协副主席期间，贾庆林是全国政协主席。
description.en: While Du Qinglin served as Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC, Jia Qinglin was the Chairman.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC

description.zh-cn: 杜青林担任全国政协副主席期间，俞正声是全国政协主席。
description.en: While Du Qinglin served as Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC, Yu Zhengsheng was the Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林担任农业部部长期间，朱镕基是国务院总理。
description.en: While Du Qinglin served as Minister of Agriculture, Zhu Rongji was the Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林担任农业部部长期间，温家宝是国务院总理。
description.en: While Du Qinglin served as Minister of Agriculture, Wen Jiabao was the Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林接替刘延东出任中共中央统战部部长。
description.en: Du Qinglin succeeded Liu Yandong as Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 令计划接替杜青林出任中共中央统战部部长。
description.en: Ling Jihua succeeded Du Qinglin as Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林接替张学忠出任中共四川省委书记。
description.en: Du Qinglin succeeded Zhang Xuezhong as Secretary of the CPC Sichuan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 刘奇葆接替杜青林出任中共四川省委书记。
description.en: Liu Qibao succeeded Du Qinglin as Secretary of the CPC Sichuan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林接替陈耀邦出任中华人民共和国农业部部长。
description.en: Du Qinglin succeeded Chen Yaobang as Minister of Agriculture of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 孙政才接替杜青林出任中华人民共和国农业部部长。
description.en: Sun Zhengcai succeeded Du Qinglin as Minister of Agriculture of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林接替阮崇武出任中共海南省委书记。
description.en: Du Qinglin succeeded Ruan Chongwu as Secretary of the CPC Hainan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 白克明接替杜青林出任中共海南省委书记。
description.en: Bai Keming succeeded Du Qinglin as Secretary of the CPC Hainan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 杜青林接替邓鸿勋出任海南省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Du Qinglin succeeded Deng Hongxun as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 张庆黎接替杜青林成为排名第一的全国政协副主席。
description.en: Zhang Qingli succeeded Du Qinglin as the first-ranking Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC.
